message.body: They paired us up again! How are you? How's your day?
Good. I like this pairing. How are you doing?
Pretty good. Might dye my hair. Deciding... Going to see BRMC tonight. Between hand painting band shirts with my niece. Pretty DIY, but...you can take t
he boy out of punk rock, but you can't take punk rock out of the boy. :-) What have you been up to?
Lol. Playing in cemeteries and drinking coffee
You were in a cemetery last time too! When you say "play"...do you mean something artistic, metaphysical, or...? And, yeah...I'm sure at this point, I'
Vampires would not like that blood
Cold stone does feel nice. I dunno...they might find it refreshing. They might be tired of going to Starbucks right before closing..."sorry, I gotta fly
I wish this sys allowed photos. I'd have you send some cool, old tombstones.
Have a great day, man. Take care.
